          <title>
            <string language="sl">Pomlad - opazovanje</string>
            <string language="en">Observation of spring</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beobachtung des Frühlinges</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Observation de ressort</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Observação da mola</string>

          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učni listi so namenjeni opazovanju narave v pomladnem času - učenci delajo v parih. Pomagamo jim s primerno literaturo, kjer lahko poiščejo določene informacije.</string>
            <string language="en">Exercises for observing the natural processes that are common in forest in early spring.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="sl">pomlad</string>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übungen für das Beobachten der natürlichen 
Prozesse, die im Wald im frühen Frühling geläufig sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exercices pour observer les processus normaux qui 
sont communs dans la forêt en premier ressort.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exercícios para observar os processos naturais 
que são comuns na floresta na mola adiantada.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Esercitazioni per l'osservazione dei processi 
naturali che sono comuni in foresta in molla in anticipo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ασκήσεις για την παρατήρηση των φυσικών διαδικασιών 
που είναι κοινές στο δάσος την πρώιμη άνοιξη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ejercicios para observar los procesos naturales 
que son comunes en bosque en resorte temprano.</string>
